full_threads.body:
hi @heath im done updating the pages, i skipped the part - "Fix the environmental logos to reflect the logos display in the spec sheet under ‘environmental’"
i cant find a clean image same on what is on the specification sheet. Thanks!
@glen can you please action the below? Cheers

Hey Heath,

Few things need to be fixed up across these pages:

FOR BOTH PRODUCT PAGES:
Remove ‘order a sample’ button from RHS of page
Can’t see the ‘downloads’ link – here we need to add link to the specification sheet (which should be in the DB folder I sent you), whereas the install guide, the warranty, the care guide etc you can use the exact same versions as our other carpet tiles
Remove NRC rating (acoustic FWC approach)
Remove NRC graph
Fix the environmental logos to reflect the logos display in the spec sheet under ‘environmental’ – let me know if you need me to send these
Change to ‘Colorways’ rather than ‘Colourway’

For ELEVATE:
Change text above ‘Request a live demo’ to:
The Elevate collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of biophilic-inspired designs across four fresh colourways. The Earth is undulating, starting with the depth of the ocean trench, moving up to the ground level of the dense hinterland, and then all the way up to the mountain summit. From here, you have the view of the land below. It is rugged and raw. From a birds-eye view, the troughs and peaks of the earth forge unique environments; Plateau, Summit, Hinterland and Ocean Foam, with colours and movement inspired by the geography of the land. 
Change text below in ‘Details to:
The Elevate collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of biophilic inspired designs across four fresh colorways. From a birds-eye view, the troughs and peaks of the earth forge unique environments; Plateau, Summit, Hinterland and Ocean Foam, with colours and movement inspired by the geography of the land.  The Elevate carpet tile collection is a 100% solution dyed nylon carpet tile in the 500mm x 500mm (19.7″ x 19.7″) square format. Available in four beautiful colourways, Elevate BarrierBack™ carpet tiles are designed for aesthetic and acoustic versatility.

For ARGENTIUM:
Change text above ‘Request a live demo’ to:
The Argentium collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of three unique tile patterns; a base charcoal grey stripe, four complementary solid bright colours and four accent highlight tiles. The name Argentium means silver alloy, relating to the silvery tones found in the aptly named base tile ‘Silver Beam’. ‘Emerald’, ‘Sapphire’, ‘Copper’ and ‘Ruby’ provide a conduit accent tile between Silver Beam and the solid highlight tiles. The solid colour contrast of ‘Emerald Solid’, ‘Sapphire Solid’, ‘Copper Solid’ and ‘Ruby Solid’ break up the greys of Silver Beam and add flair and colour pops. This interesting blend of solid colour and accent tiles makes the Argentium collection perfect for mixing and matching to create unique floor patterns, ideal for education and office spaces.
Change text under ‘Details’ to:
The Argentium collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of three unique tile patterns; a base charcoal grey stripe, complementary four solid bright colours and four accent highlight tiles. This interesting blend of solid colour and accent tiles makes the Argentium collection perfect for mixing and matching to create unique floor patterns, ideal for education and office spaces. The Argentium carpet tile collection is a 100% solution dyed nylon carpet tile in the 500mm x 500mm (19.7″ x 19.7″) square format. Available in nine beautiful colorways, Argentium BarrierBack™ carpet tiles are designed for aesthetic and acoustic versatility.

Thanks!


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,


I have 2 x new carpet tile collections to add to the Australian and global website. These are 'Elevate' and 'Argentium'. These will also need to be added to the menu navigation when ready, as well as the carpet tiles landing page.


Spec sheet, 2 x 'hero/product' images and carpet scans/swatches should be accessible in this link here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/gncvtlcy2fzihor/AAArlof_qRcAaQoeEHNu8kXQa?dl=0. Install guide, warranty etc can be carrier across from the other carpet tile product pages.


These don't require acoustic graphs or NRC ratings FYI.

Copy/narrative for the website for each is as follows:


ARGENTIUM:


Narrative/Website Copy

The Argentium collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of three unique tile patterns; a base charcoal grey stripe, four complementary solid bright colours and four accent highlight tiles. The name Argentium means silver alloy, relating to the silvery tones found in the aptly named base tile 'Silver Beam'. 'Emerald', 'Sapphire', 'Copper' and 'Ruby' provide a conduit accent tile between Silver Beam and the solid highlight tiles. The solid colour contrast of 'Emerald Solid', 'Sapphire Solid', 'Copper Solid' and 'Ruby Solid' break up the greys of Silver Beam and add flair and colour pops. This interesting blend of solid colour and accent tiles makes the Argentium collection perfect for mixing and matching to create unique floor patterns, ideal for education and office spaces.

Specification sheet copy

The Argentium collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of three unique tile patterns; a base charcoal grey stripe, complementary four solid bright colours and four accent highlight tiles. This interesting blend of solid colour and accent tiles makes the Argentium collection perfect for mixing and matching to create unique floor patterns, ideal for education and office spaces.

The Argentium carpet tile collection is a 100% solution dyed nylon carpet tile in the 500mm x 500mm (19.7" x 19.7") square format. Available in nine beautiful colorways, Argentium BarrierBack™ carpet tiles are designed for aesthetic and acoustic versatility.


SPECIFICATIONS:


Surface

Floor

Composition

100% solution dyed nylon

Material

BarrierBack™

Style

Level loop pile

Recycled Content

100% Econyl yarn

Thickness

7mm +/- 1mm, 0.28" +/- 0.04"

Dimensions

· 500mm x 500mm / 19.7"x 19.7"

Fire Tests

AS/ISO 9239.1



ELEVATE:

Narrative/Website copy

The Elevate collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of biophilic-inspired designs across four fresh colourways. The Earth is undulating, starting with the depth of the ocean trench, moving up to the ground level of the dense hinterland, and then all the way up to the mountain summit. From here, you have the view of the land below. It is rugged and raw. From a birds-eye view, the troughs and peaks of the earth forge unique environments; Plateau, Summit, Hinterland and Ocean Foam, with colours and movement inspired by the geography of the land.  

Specification sheet copy

The Elevate collection of BarrierBack™ carpet tiles is comprised of biophilic inspired designs across four fresh colorways. From a birds-eye view, the troughs and peaks of the earth forge unique environments; Plateau, Summit, Hinterland and Ocean Foam, with colours and movement inspired by the geography of the land.  The Elevate carpet tile collection is a 100% solution dyed nylon carpet tile in the 500mm x 500mm (19.7" x 19.7") square format. Available in four beautiful colourways, Elevate BarrierBack™ carpet tiles are designed for aesthetic and acoustic versatility.


SPECIFICATIONS:

· 500mm x 500mm / 19.7"x 19.7"

Fire Tests

AS/ISO 9239.1
